Roadmap.sub_heading: Dive into a captivating world of 3D character digital collectibles, where each piece is not only a work of art but a highly customizable experience. Perfect for the discerning collector who values uniqueness and interactivity

swappableTraits.title: Swappable Traits
paragraphs: Plague Poppets aren't just ordinary digital collectibles. You can personalize your Poppet with a variety of traits, such as clothes, necklaces, and hats - all of which are unique digital collectibles themselves!
Every time you apply a new trait, your Poppet's digital collectible art is dynamically re-rendered.
Trade, purchase, and apply traits to make your Poppet truly one of a kind.

ARJournal.title: AR Enabled Journaling
paragraphs: Every Plague Poppet comes with its own AR journal. Use our proprietary AR app to place your Poppet in the real world, and create enduring memories with your character.
Take snapshots of your Poppet in various scenarios and post them to social media or store them as journal entries attached to your digital collectible.

highQualityArt.title: Highest Quality 4K Digital Art Assets
paragraphs: The Plague Poppets digital collectibles are rendered with meticulous care and attention to detail. Each asset is displayed in stunning 4K resolution with photorealistic textures, giving the characters an eye-catching visual depth.

We have developed a specialized 3D production pipeline, particularly for the rendering of fabric-like materials. This cutting-edge technique ensures that every thread and fiber in our digital collectibles comes to life, showcasing an unparalleled level of realism and attention to detail.

Our creative process is a labor of love, guided by the visionary direction of Juli Adams, the creator of the Plague Poppets. Each collectible is designed to mirror the handcrafted nature of Juli's original creations, reproducing their unique charm and aesthetic appeal in a digital format.

callToAction.title: Join the Plague Poppets Revolution!
paragraphs: Don't miss out on the latest updates and releases. Be part of the ever-evolving world of Plague Poppets, where every digital collectible comes to life in an extraordinary way.
Sign up today to receive exclusive updates and become a part of our thriving community. Follow us on Twitter and join our Discord server
Stay connected, stay informed, and let's redefine the world of digital collectibles together.

meet_the_artist.about: Juli Adams is a Seattle-based painter and mixed-media artist whose work touches on the dark and the macabre. Her earliest visual influences were illustrated children’s books like The Wind in the Willows and Alice in Wonderland, and comics like The Addams Family, Bloom County, and Peanuts. These works - and the worlds they contained - inspired her to begin making art using found materials, long before she picked up her first paintbrush.
meet_the_artist.quote: The universe I have created is a place where my characters are living a parallel life with us. They look out at us, as alive, confused and as in wonder as we are.
meet_the_artist.author: Juli Adams
meet_the_artist.origin: The origins of the Plague Poppets can be traced to those early years spent creating objects from thought and emotion, however it was in 2020 that Juli first assembled them in physical form. Each was handmade, crafted with great attention to detail and incorporating a variety of colors and textures. Some were even made with pieces of Juli’s own clothes. However, while the process was slow, the Poppets themselves found homes as quickly as they were finished. First with Juli’s friends, then with strangers. Soon Juli was sending them off to other cities and states.

Poppets Story.description: Owners began to send pictures of their Poppets back to Juli, treating them not as toys, but as companions in both daily life and on grand adventures. The Poppets, it seemed, were taking on lives of their own and bringing happiness to those whose homes they shared. And as her collection of photos grew, Juli began to wonder if there was a way to open the experience to more people, even if the lengthy assembly process made creating so many physical dolls impossible.

Poppets' Digital Expansion.description: In 2022 Juli’s lifelong love for non-traditional art forms led her to the answer: the Poppets would enter the digital realm. As NFTs, each Plague Poppet could still retain its unique characteristics while allowing production to scale so that owners across the world might have a chance to experience adventures with their very own Small And Mighty Friends.

answer1.adventures: Adventurous and kind, Plague Poppets are magical creatures that love humans. Each is born with its own unique personality and talents, which develop and emerge as they grow.
answer1.crusious: Due to their clever and curious natures, Poppets need humans to keep them safe as they explore the world, relying on ourhelp to fully harness their powers.
answer1.history: Throughout history these strange and marvelous beings have lived side by side with humanity, making our lives better,odder, and entirely more wonderful.
answer1.traits: Each Poppet comes with its own mix of rare and common traits that ensure it is unlike any other in existence. Texture,color, clothing, accessories and more vary widely to ensure endless diversity. Once adopted, each Poppet will become even more unique through the use of our journaling feature which allows owners to create a one-of-a-kind history in real time.

About_Plague_Poppets.question2: How do I get a Poppet?

answer2.minting: Soon we will open the Plague Poppets adoption list which will give access to the genesis drop, the very first Plague Poppets Orbs minting event.
answer2.adoption: The adoption list works like an allow list as used by many other NFT projects.Once you have minted an NFT Orb you will be able to reveal your Plague Poppet soon after.Once your Plague Poppet is revealed you will have access to all the special features that a Poppet adopting parent has access to.

answer3.NFT: An NFT (which stands for Non-Fungible Token) is a digital product like a piece of art or memorabilia that is completely unique. Imagine a rare comic book: it can be traded or sold, but nothing else like it exists. Even another copy of the same comic is a different item with its own history, attributes and value. The creation and ownership of an NFT is recorded in a digital ledger called a blockchain.

About_Plague_Poppets.question4: How do I find out about new drops?

answer4.information: The best sources for information on the latest news and updates - including drops, lore, animations and more - are our Twitter page and our Discord community, but the most efficient way is to signup with your email address for notifications from us. We will not spam you, and you will receive only relevant information to the Plague Poppets world. The signup form is on the splash page of this website.

Your continued use of the Plague Poppets Services following the posting of changes to these terms will mean you accept those changes.
Data.Poppet_info: Plague Poppets collects and stores the information that you enter into the Plague Poppets website in order to provide products and services that you may have ordered or requested,to process requests, and to provide customer service.Depending upon the nature of the product, service, or request, we may collect and store your name, billing address, email address, telephone number, credit card number and credit card expiration date. In addition, certain portions of the Plague Poppets website may now or in the future require registration in order to participate, such as signing up for the Plague Poppets Allow List, comments sections, suggestions, or customer service requests; Plague Poppets collects the personal information that you have knowingly provided in order to complete that registration.
Data.anonymus-info: Plague Poppets may also automatically gather certain “anonymous information” about your interaction with the Plague Poppets website, which is information that does not identify you individually. Generally, this information is collected through 'traffic data' and may involve the use of Cookies, IP addresses or other numeric codes used to identify a computer.We also collect information regarding user traffic patterns and site usage. This information is used to analyze and improve the Plague Poppets Services.
Data.email_to_plaguepoppet: If you email Plague Poppets, we may save your message and email address in order to respond to your queries and to improve our products and services. Please be aware that any ideas, suggestions, business information, or other information that you include in emails to Plague Poppets will be treated as non-confidential and non-proprietary.
Data.under_16: Please be aware that Plague Poppets does not permit usage of the Services by children under the age of 16, and legal consent of a parent or guardian is required for users under the age of 18.
Data.cookies: Plague Poppets may place Internet “cookies” on visitors’ hard drives. Cookies save data about individual visitors, such as the visitor’s name, password, user-name, screen preferences,the pages of a site viewed by the visitor, and the advertisements viewed or clicked by the visitor. When the visitor revisits the Site, Plague Poppets may recognize the visitor by the Internet cookie and customize the visitor’s experience accordingly. You may decline cookies, if any, by using the appropriate feature of your Web client software, if available; however, this may impair certain features of the Plague Poppets Website.​
Data.sell: Plague Poppets will not sell, rent or share your contact information with commercial businesses. We use the personal information you provide to the Plague Poppets Website for internal purposes such as fulfilling requests, orders,providing customer service, tracking your compliance with the website’s rules and regulations, or for editorial and feedback purposes.
Data.personal_communication: Plague Poppets may use personal information collected from the Plague Poppets Website in order to contact you about sales,special offers, and new site features. You can stop receiving email communications from us at any time by selecting the “unsubscribe” text link provided at the bottom of all email communications.
Data.vendors: On occasion, Plague Poppets may contract with third-party vendors to perform certain functions on Plague Poppets’s behalf, such as email sign-up and distribution, marketing,analytics, credit card processing, customer service, fraud protection, fundraising, etc. These entities have access to the personal information needed to perform their functions.Plague Poppets requires its vendors to maintain the confidentiality and security of personal information,including information collected on Plague Poppets’s behalf through the use of cookies, and prohibits the vendors from using, selling, distributing or altering this data in any not expressly authorized by Plague Poppets.
Data.information_vistor: Plague Poppets uses visitors’ anonymous information to compile statistics on how our users collectively use the Plague Poppets Website, and we provide this statistical information in aggregated form to our partners and other third parties. We may also use or share anonymous information in any other manner that we deem appropriate or necessary.
Data.emergency: Plague Poppets may use or disclose personal information if required to do so by law or in the good-faith belief that such action is necessary to (a) conform to applicable law or comply with legal process served on us or the Plague Poppets website; (b) protect and defend our rights or property, the Plague Poppets Website or our users; and (c) act under emergency circumstances to protect the personal safety of us, our affiliates, agents, the users of the Plague Poppets Website or the public.​
Data.security: Personal information collected by the Plague Poppets website is stored in secure operating environments that are not available to the public. In many instances, such as in the case of credit card numbers and all online purchases,the personal information is encrypted before you conduct your transaction. Only those employees who need access to your personal information in order to do their jobs are allowed access. While Plague Poppets makes reasonable efforts to safeguard your personal information once we receive it, no transmission of data over the Internet or any other public network can be guaranteed to be 100% secure. As a result,Plague Poppets cannot ensure or warrant the security of any information you transmit to us or information we transmit to you from our website.
Data.revisions: Plague Poppets reserves the right to modify or amend the terms of our privacy policy from time to time without notice. You should read this privacy policy each time you use our website so that you do not miss any notice of changes to the privacy policy.​
Data.jurisdiction: By using the Plague Poppets Website, you agree that law,jurisdiction, venue, limitations of liability, and dispute resolution provisions set forth in the Terms of Use.

team.Fulcanelli: A jack of all trades and master of none, the fool with a plan that his heart has undone.While visiting Juli, a drizzly mid-winter Sunday afternoon, embers glowing in the fireplace, Poppets looking at them from the sewing table, they agreed that this was a good idea.
team.Bleubury: Bleubury spends his days (and nights) tending to the Orphanarium's gardens and berry patches. Toiling away under sun and moon alike, he occasionally unearths magical wonders, which he trades for more berries at the Orphanarium Exchange.
team.Erstwhile: Erstwhile climbed a mountain once. He was in a cult once. He was a zealot once. He ran a company once. He dabbled in fine art once. Then he met some dear Poppets who are trying to save him from the past.
team.Zero: Zero loves to create, curate, and connect artists to design magical environments and give characters a safe place to live and breathe. Art, Architecture and Music are some of his main influences when world building and storytelling. During the night he adventures into the Orphanarium to build secret doors, hidden hallways, and rearrange the furniture for fun.
team.Foo: Foo is an artist, through and through. From music to drawing and even video games too! Living under the couch, he collected in his pouch, many forms of dust bunnies from which he made Poppet mummies. Foo became obsessed and just couldn't drop it. He couldn't help but to try and create more Poppets!
team.Strangeruff: started his journey to the orphanarium selling digital forks to feed analog people. He’s been to Venus and back and believes two things down to his seams: generosity attracts generosity and the world will be saved by beauty.
team.Metric: Metric (TJ) shepherds lost and wandering Poppets into the Orphanarium, guiding them along their way through the many rooms and chambers of that hallowed sanctuary. Occasionally, he enjoys sneaking bits of crusty bread away from Ma Peeb's kitchen and feeding them to the Eyemaker in exchange for Poppet tales.
team.Nikki: Poppet and puppy enthusiast. Mostly found spreading vibes in the community, managing the Poppets’ social media presence and trying to emulate their incredibly unique sense of style and wonder.
team.Colby: Full-Time Resident of the Orphanarium and finder of Sounds around town. Always down to explore with Poppet friends, whether behind the cupboard or the Outer known reaches of the Universe.
